title: NEo pax sivir is taking ages
body: Umm hi so i literally opened a ticket so i can redeem my skin it was like 17 hours ago so basically i want to know how long will it take so i can actually have to play with my new skin! Im really thrilled for it but still no response from my ticket

replies.body: Aw, sorry to hear you're having issues redeeming the skin.  :(  Our game support team may be a bit backed up, so it could be a bit.  Toss me your ticket number, and I can check on your ticket status for you!
=s sadly yea its been like 19 hours now 31679214 this is my ticket code. id be so thankful it came since i started loving sivir nowadays as i look at some cool clips on youtube about her gameplay =c
Thanks!  I was able to confirm you ticket was received, and it's currently in our queue for review.  Hang tight and a specialist will reach out as soon as they can!
thanks so much! ill be waiting! im so thrilled for it! thanks alot and i hope i can get it asap! woow im happy now
So yea its now 36 hours =\ still no skin idk why this is happening please help does it take this long? Or am i just a bit over worried
i kinda have the same problem its been 24 hours and still no answere and i am kinda worried cause the code expires in 12/9
